name: Minesweeper (Hexagonal)
description:
A minesweeper clone that supports hexagonal grids

  • Left mouse button - uncover tile
  • Right mouse button - Set flag/Question mark* on tile
  • Middle mouse button - Show tile neighbours 
  • Middle mouse scroll - Zoom in/out
  • Left mouse hold&drag - camera movement

*Flag doesn't allow you to uncover the tile but the question mark still does!
